K10D0177_H0178:376b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i nir de sha n'a ma mah'a ya na s'u tra /
K10D0177_H0178:376b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0177_H0178:376b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0177_H0178:376b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0177_H0178:376b-7: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed
K10D0177_H0178:376b-8: kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
K10D0177_H0178:376b-9: ba na / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10D0177_H0178:376b-10: byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tham pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K10D0177_H0178:376b-11: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing /
K10D0177_H0178:376b-12: mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to //
K10D0177_H0178:376b-13: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po
K10D0177_H0178:376b-14: che'i gdugs dpag tshad bcus 'khor ba tsam thogs nas
K10D0177_H0178:377a-0: / bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng @377a *//
K10D0177_H0178:377a-1: gi drang thad na 'dzin cing 'dug go /
K10D0177_H0178:377a-2: de nas yongs su dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu
K10D0177_H0178:377a-3: mtshams bzang zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang
K10D0177_H0178:377a-4: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
K10D0177_H0178:377a-6: 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa stan las langs te /
K10D0177_H0178:377a-7: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
K10D0177_H0178:377a-8: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0177_H0178:377a-10: khyod bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mdzad pas da dung thugs mtshim lags sam /
K10D0177_H0178:377a-14: rgya mtsho chen po chu zad pas chog par 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mam /
K10D0177_H0178:377a-20: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya
K10D0177_H0178:377a-21: mtsho chen po lta bu zab cing gting dpag dga'
K10D0177_H0178:377a-22: la / dpag tu med pa yongs su tshol bar
K10D0177_H0178:377a-23: 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
K10D0177_H0178:377a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod
K10D0177_H0178:377a-25: pas gzhar yang chog par 'dzin par mi bya'o //
K10D0177_H0178:377a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-0: dmigs pa @377b bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o //
K10D0177_H0178:377b-3: byang chub kyi sems la dmigs pa dang /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-4: sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba la dmigs pa dang /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-5: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la dmigs pa ste /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-8: dmigs pa bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pal mchod par bya'o //
K10D0177_H0178:377b-9: 'jam dpal gyis de skad ces smras nas /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-12: dge slong ma de dag dang /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-13: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-14: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-18: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0177_H0178:377b-19: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0177_H0178:377b-20: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0177_H0178:377b-21: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra po dhi dang /
